testcase.name: TC02 Urunu sepete ekleme

testcase.classname: US0014 Place Order: Register while Checkout
testcase.name: TC03 Kayit olusturma

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: When kullanici Register Login butonuna tiklar..............................undefined When kullanici isim ve mail adresini girer..................................skipped Then Singup butonuna tiklar.................................................skipped Then acilan sayfada ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION yazisinin gorunurlugunu test eder.skipped Then kullanici birinci bolum icin Email, Password, Date of birth kisimlarini doldurur.skipped Then kullanici Sign up for our newsletter! checkbox' ini secer..............skipped Then kullanici Receive special offers from our partners! checkbox' ini secer.skipped Then kullanici ikinci bolum icin gerekli kisimlari doldurur.................skipped Then kullnici Creat Account butonuna tiklar.................................skipped Then kullanici hesabin olustugunu dogrular..................................skipped Then kullanici Continue butonuna basar......................................skipped And kullanici sag ustteki kullanici adi ile giris yaptigini dogrular........skipped

testcase.classname: US0014 Place Order: Register while Checkout
testcase.name: TC04 Siparis verme
testcase.system-out: When kullanici Cart butonuna tiklar.........................................passed Then kullanici Proceed To Checkout butonuna tiklar..........................passed Then kullanici adres bilgilerini ve siparisi dogrular.......................passed Then kullanici text kismina aciklama girer ve Place Order butonuna tiklar...passed Then kullanici odeme ayrintilarini doldurur.................................passed Then kullanici Pay and Confirm Order butonuna tiklar........................passed Then kullanici Your order has been placed successfully! yazisini gorur......passed Then kullanici Delete Account butonuna tiklar...............................passed And kullanici Account Deleted! yazisini gorur ve Continue butonuna tiklar...passed
